title: Emerald & Diamond Leaf Haaram - Prakruthi Shobha Collection
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish; Natural Emeralds (Pear Cut
High Clarity) weighing approximately 15 carats; Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
features: This exquisite Haaram features a delicate leaf-and-vine motif. Each leaf is meticulously crafted in 18k gold and studded with pave-set diamonds. The pear-shaped emeralds are securely bezel-set, accentuating their vibrant green hue. The necklace showcases a contemporary interpretation of traditional South Indian design, blending classic elements with modern aesthetics. Fine Milgrain detailing on the goldwork adds a touch of vintage charm.
occasions: and other special occasions. Its elegant design also complements contemporary ethnic wear for modern events.
description: This Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The high-quality emeralds and diamonds ensure lasting brilliance, while the Hyderabadi polish provides a rich, luxurious finish. It's a versatile piece that can be cherished for generations, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The emeralds symbolize prosperity and good fortune, making it an auspicious choice for celebratory occasions.
